snippet: Three East End producers opened their second tasting rooms recently.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines column notes that East End wine producers Lieb Cellars, Roanoke Vineyards and Jamesport Vineyards have all opened new tasting rooms on Long Island (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: Three East End producers opened their second tasting rooms recently.

headline.main: New Tasting Rooms on East End
headline.print_headline: New Tasting Rooms on East End
